sect3.title: Activating the Dialog
sect3.para:
The preferences dialog can be accessed from the main menu, through
Edit Preferences .

sect3.title: Options

variablelist.title: Debug Policy
variablelist.para: The Debug Policy tells GIMP what you want to do if GIMP encounters a problem. You have four choices:

varlistentry.term: Debug warnings, critical errors and crashes

listitem.para: This is the most intrusive option. Usually only used when trying to find a specific bug. This starts the debugger for any kind of crash, error or warning.
Start debugging when GIMP encounters a crash or a critical error.
Only start debugging when GIMP encounters a crash.
Whatever happens, the debugger will never be started.

sect3.para: Effective debugging is only possible if you have gdb or lldb installed.
